attributes.action: Bann cruelty to Lobsters in the form of Boiling them alive
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is a 'tradition' to purchase living lobsters and boil them alive. It is unethical and more importantly cruel. You would not allow the boiling of a Cow, a Pig or a Lamb in preparation for a meal.
Whats worse is that there ARE alternatives.
